becomeAScratcher.congratulations.header: Congratulations, {username}! You have shown that you are ready to become a SteamHuber.
becomeAScratcher.congratulations.body: SteamHub is a friendly and welcoming community for everyone, where people create, share, and learn together. We welcome people of all ages, races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientations, and gender identities.
becomeAScratcher.toBeAScratcher.header: What does it mean to be a SteamHuber?
becomeAScratcher.toBeAScratcher.body: You might notice on your profile page that you are currently a “New SteamHuber”. Now that you have spent some time on Scratch, we invite you to become a “Scratcher”.
becomeAScratcher.toBeAScratcher.definiti: SteamHuber have a bit more experience on SteamHuber and are excited to both contribute to the community and to make it a supportive and welcoming space for others.
becomeAScratcher.toBeAScratcher.canDo: Here are some things SteamHuber do:
becomeAScratcher.toBeAScratcher.communit: Next, we will take you through the community guidelines and explain what these are.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.respectSecti: Become a SteamHuber - Treat everyone with respect
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.respectBody: Everyone on SteamHuber is encouraged to share things that excite them and are important to them—we hope that you find ways to celebrate your own identity on SteamHub, and allow others to do the same.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.safeHeader: SteamHuber are safe: we keep personal and contact information private.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.safeBody: This includes not sharing real last names, phone numbers, addresses, hometowns, school names, email addresses, usernames or links to social media sites, video chatting applications, or websites with private chat functionality.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.feedbackSect: Become a SteamHuber - Give helpful feedback
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.feedbackBody: When commenting on a project, remember to say something you like about it, offer suggestions, and be kind, not critical.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix1Sectio: Become a SteamHuber - Embrace remix culture
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix1Body: Remixing is when you build upon someone else’s projects, code, ideas, images, or anything else they share on SteamHub to make your own unique creation.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix2Sectio: Become a SteamHuber - Embrace remix culture
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix2Header: Remixing is a great way to collaborate and connect with other SteamHuber.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix2Body: You are encouraged to use anything you find on SteamhHuber in your own creations, as long as you provide credit to everyone whose work you used and make a meaningful change to it.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix3Sectio: Become a SteamHub - Embrace remix culture
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.remix3Body: When you share something on SteamHub, you are giving permission to all SteamHuber to use your work in their creations, too.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.honestBody: It’s important to be honest and authentic when interacting with others on SteamHub, and remember that there is a person behind every SteamHub account.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.friendlySect: Become a SteamHuber - Keep the site friendly
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.friendlyHead: SteamHuber help keep the site friendly.
becomeAScratcher.guidelines.friendlyBody: It’s important to keep your creations and conversations friendly and appropriate for all ages. If you think something on SteamHub is mean, insulting, too violent, or otherwise disruptive to the community, click “Report” to let us know about it.
becomeAScratcher.invitation.header: {username}, we invite you to become a SteamHuber.
becomeAScratcher.invitation.body: SteamHub is a friendly and welcoming community for everyone. If you agree to be respectful, be safe, give helpful feedback, embrace remix culture, be honest, and help keep the site friendly, click “I agree!”
becomeAScratcher.invitation.finishLater: You get to decide if you want to become a SteamHuber. If you do not want to be a SteamHuber yet, just click “Finish Later” above.
becomeAScratcher.success.header: Hooray! You are now officially a SteamHuber.
becomeAScratcher.success.body: Here are some links that might be helpful for you.
becomeAScratcher.noInvitation.header: Whoops! Looks like you haven’t received an invitation to become a SteamHuber yet.
becomeAScratcher.noInvitation.body: To become a SteamHuber, you must be active on SteamHub for a while, share several projects, and comment constructively in the community. After a few weeks, you will receive a notification inviting you to become a Scratcher. Scratch on!
becomeAScratcher.finishLater.body: By leaving this page, you will not finish the process to become a SteamHub and will stay as a New SteamHub. If you change your mind later, you can always come back via your profile page.
becomeAScratcher.finishLater.clickBecome: Just click on “★ Become a SteamHub!” below your username.
